name: Hope (itch) (BlindByte, jpgcakezz, Blue Barry)
description: Made for the Freedom Game Jam by BlindByte, BlueBarry & jpgcakezz. "In this game play as Hope, a rare & highly sought after little fish in an ocean where freedom is a never-ending cruel gamble. Dodge the lingering hooks above & the strangling seaweed below as you run- or well swim- for your life & right to live a free fishy life."
